bibl.title: Corpus Papyrorum Judaicarum. Volume I.
bibl.publisher: Harvard University Press (Published for the Magnes Press
bibl.seg: Tcherikover Victor, in collaboration with Alexander Fuks, Corpus Papyrorum Judaicarum. Volume I.
Cambridge, Mass., Harvard University Press (Published for the Magnes Press, The Hebrew University), 1957, 4°, xx-294 pp.

C.R. par I.D. Amusia, VDI 68 (1959, fasc. 2), pp. 192-198. - S. Applebaum, BibO 15 (1958) pp. 47-49. - Vincenzo Arangio-Ruiz, RivFil N.S., 37 (1959) pp. 71-79. - Pierre Benoit, RBibl 66 (1959) pp. 467-469. - James Day, AJP 80 (1959) pp. 430-436. - Louis H. Feldman, CW 52 (1958) pp. 92-93. - Ludwig Koenen, Gnomon 31 (1959) pp. 422-429. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 33 (1958) No. 66, pp. 294-299. - Eric G. Turner, CR N.S., 9 (1959) pp. 67-69. - B.A. van Groningen, Mnemosyne 4a s., 11 (1958) pp. 360-361.
